priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Cardiac Valvular Regurgitation Severity Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C101853

self.title: CDISC SDTM Cardiac Valvular Regurgitation Severity Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist to describe the severity of cardiac valvular regurgitation.
name: Cardiac Valvular Regurgitation Severity
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Cardiac Valvular Regurgitation Severity Terminology

terms.definition: Evidence of mild retrograde blood flow through the valve(s) of the heart.
Evidence of moderate retrograde blood flow through the valve(s) of the heart.
No evidence of any retrograde blood flow through the valve(s) in the heart.
Evidence of severe retrograde blood flow through the valve(s) of the heart.
